p: Having suly sworn an oath says that in the city and county of WallaWalla and Territory of Washington on the 14th day of February AD 1888 one George Grant did then and there, against the order of nature wickedly and diabolically with a certain mare have a certain venereal and carnal intercourse and did then and there, against the order of nature carnally show the said mare, and then and there, with the said mare did commit and perpetuate the detestable and abominable of buggery.
Wherefore prays that the said George Grant may be arrested and dealt with according to law
Subscribed and sworn to before on this 15th of February AD 1888
